Title: The Ballad of Kevin and Tess
Plot: Kevin Burkoff  becomes a marked man when his research on promicin is discovered. When Tom and Diana search for him, they discover how far he will go to protect his work. Shawn meets his idol at the 4400 Center.
GuestStars: Erin Borgfjord,  David Milchard,  Conrad Burek,  Grace Sherman,  Brandy Heidrick,  Danielle Kremeniuk,  Nancy Sivak,  Michael Kopsa,  Richard Kahan,  Neil Hopkins,  Kathryn Gordon
